item.description:
The Conduit performs a sound healing meditation concert to re-charge and re-balance energy in the New Year. Using a profoundly transformational system of sound healing that incorporates the use of planetary gongs, Tibetan singing bowls and Acutonic tuning forks, the concert harmonizes the sounds of our universe through vibration.

Sound and vibration re-awaken a deep appreciation for the whole body even on a cellular level. Resonance is a critical concept in understanding the impact of sound on the physical body. It is defined as an echo, a continuation of ringing. It is the quality of one vibrating
body as it reaches out and sets another body into motion.

The sounds of gongs and Tibetan bowls vibrate the energy in the chakras and meridians clearing blockages allowing our life force to flow freely. Also affecting us in a transformative way, tuning forks provide a method of attunement or synchronization between the rhythm of the forks and the rhythms of our subtle energy bodies.

Join The Conduit and others as we meditate and connect with the sacredness of the universe through sound and vibration. A $20 donation goes to support the work of The Conduit and the Growing Green Co-op's healing arts space.

All Green Vibration Members receive a 10% discount and a free sauna session after the concert! To learn more about monthly memberships, please visit www.GrowingGreenEvents.com/Join-Our-Community.

Before the concert at 6 pm, Alchemy After Hours Cafe will be open serving juice, tea and snacks.
item.name: Transformational Sound Healing
